name: Armada F/X Racers
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Color (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Put adventure into overdrive, as you captain a futuristic vehicle, and race through six alien worlds to face off in a battle of wills, thrills, chills and spills. Take on opposing high-tech vehicles, obstacles and obstructions - all as you approach a final showdown against multiple-bosses in a good 'ol game of bumper cars, minus the bumpers.

Features:
  • 6 futuristic race cars.
  • 6 alien worlds to race upon, each with its own dangers and geo-effects.
  • 3 modes of racing, including a secret "Survival" mode, where the only secret is how to stay alive.
  • 18 bosses.
  • Special power-ups to upgrade vehicle performance.
  • Outrageous obstacles, including alien spiders and metal drills.
